vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.31;
son of: Mahol (H4235);
brother of: Ethan (H0387), Heman (H1968) and Darda (H1862)
§ Calcol or Chalcol = "sustaining"
son or descendant of Zerah of Judah and one of the wise men with whom Solomon was compared
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Mahol; hombre sabio; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   hijo de Zérah; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
甲各(Calcol 或 Chalcol) 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "支撐"
猶大人謝拉的兒子或後裔, 他是被用以來和所羅門王的智慧比較的智者之一
(王上 4:31;代上 2:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
甲各(Calcol 或 Chalcol) 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "支撑"
犹大人谢拉的儿子或后裔, 他是被用以来和所罗门王的智慧比较的智者之一
(王上 4:31;代上 2:6)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.6;
son of: Zerah (H2226I);
brother of: Zabdi (H2067), Ethan (H0387H), Heman (H1968H) and Dara (H1873)
§ Calcol or Chalcol = "sustaining"
son or descendant of Zerah of Judah and one of the wise men with whom Solomon was compared
